sentences.sContent: Don't go your entire life as a “hammer” doing the job of a “screwdriver.
sentences.sContent_eng: Don't go your entire life as a “hammer” doing the job of a “screwdriver.
sentences.sCn: 不要如此度过你的一生：明明是“锤子”却做着“螺丝刀”的工作。

sentences.sContent: So, put down the hammer and screwdriver, and place the socket over the nut and turn.
sentences.sContent_eng: So, put down the hammer and screwdriver, and place the socket over the nut and turn.
sentences.sCn: 那么，放下锤子和螺丝刀，将套筒扳手放到螺母上拧动。

sentences.sContent: It would be a tragedy to go your entire life as a “hammer,” doing the job of a “screwdriver.” Everybody has a purpose, a reason they were created.
sentences.sContent_eng: It would be a tragedy to go your entire life as a “hammer,” doing the job of a “screwdriver.” Everybody has a purpose, a reason they were created.
sentences.sCn: 如果你明明是“锤子”却做着“螺丝刀”的工作，那真的是一个悲剧。每个人都有个目标，那便是他们被创造的理由。

words.tran: 拧紧（screw的ing形式）；用螺钉固定

trans.tranOther: a tool with a narrow blade at one end that you use for turning screws
